snippet.title: Mayhem in Single Valley - Release Date Trailer
snippet.description:
Let the mayhem begin on May 20! Wishlist now:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/622680/Mayhem_in_Single_Valley/?utm_source=YouTube&utm_medium=Description&utm_campaign=Mayhem-Announce-Release-Date&utm_content=YouTube-Description

Mayhem in Single Valley is a fast-paced, puzzle-loaded action adventure. Save the world, and keep the town together - but keep everyone from finding out it was all your fault.

Twitter: https://twitter.com/MayhemValley
Discord: https://discord.com/invite/mayheminsinglevalley
